_header: O blessed Queen about the starred heaven
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ?John Lydgate, ‘Stella celi extirpauit’, perhaps by Lydgate — four 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BodRawC48.First Lines:
O blissid queen a bove sterrid heueneWhich of the see art callid
                    cheef lodsterre…
BodRawC48.Last Lines:
…The thrid is that my soule withouten distresseMay come to the
                    blisse wher drad is no pestilence
BodRawC48.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 295-6.
